# cloudtemple_marketplace_item (Data Source)

Used to retrieve a specific item from the marketplace.

To query this datasource you will need the `` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_marketplace_item" "example_by_id" {
  id = "12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012"
}

data "cloudtemple_marketplace_item" "example_by_name" {
  name = "Ubuntu 22.04 LTS"
}

output "item_id" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_marketplace_item.example_by_name.id
}

output "item_description" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_marketplace_item.example_by_name.description
}

output "item_version" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_marketplace_item.example_by_name.version
}

output "deployment_targets" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_marketplace_item.example_by_name.deployment_options[0].targets
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the marketplace item to retrieve. Conflicts with `name`.
- `name` (String) The name of the marketplace item to retrieve. Conflicts with `id`.

### Read-Only

- `build` (String) The build of the marketplace item.
- `categories` (List of String) The categories of the marketplace item.
- `creation_date` (String) The creation date of the marketplace item.
- `deployment_options` (List of Object) Deployment options for the marketplace item. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--deployment_options))
- `description` (String) The description of the marketplace item (French).
- `description_en` (String) The description of the marketplace item (English).
- `details` (List of Object) Details about the marketplace item (French). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--details))
- `details_en` (List of Object) Details about the marketplace item (English). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--details_en))
- `editor` (String) The editor/publisher of the marketplace item.
- `icon` (String) The icon URL of the marketplace item.
- `last_update` (String) The last update date of the marketplace item.
- `type` (String) The type of the marketplace item.
- `version` (String) The version of the marketplace item.

<a id="nestedatt--deployment_options"></a>
### Nested Schema for `deployment_options`

Read-Only:

- `targets` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--deployment_options--targets))

<a id="nestedobjatt--deployment_options--targets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `deployment_options.targets`

Read-Only:

- `files` (List of String)
- `key` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `skus` (List of String)



<a id="nestedatt--details"></a>
### Nested Schema for `details`

Read-Only:

- `how_to_use` (String)
- `overview` (String)
- `support` (String)
- `terms_and_conditions` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--details_en"></a>
### Nested Schema for `details_en`

Read-Only:

- `how_to_use` (String)
- `overview` (String)
- `support` (String)
- `terms_and_conditions` (String)
